entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is present in the scene and is talking about Aragog. He is described as having a morose tone when talking about his past experiences.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is a person who is present in the scene and is drinking with Hagrid. He responds to Hagrid's story with a positive comment.

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is an animal that was hatched from an egg and kept by Hagrid. It is described as being the size of a Pekinese.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is a person who is mentioned in the context of Hagrid's past experiences. He is described as having contrived to have Hagrid thrown out of school.

entities.name: felix felicis
entities.description: Felix Felicis is an object that is used by Harry to gain insight into his future. It is described as illuminating the way ahead for him.

relationships.description: Hagrid owned Aragog, keeping it in a cupboard at school.
Tom Riddle caused problems for Hagrid, leading to him being thrown out of school.
